casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Andre Lamar WOODY. No. 301P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of June 2007 *562by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-28":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
